heading: HR00824
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, TO INQUIRE AND REVIEW, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, PROGRESS IN THE COLLECTION OF SSS CONTRIBUTIONS WITH A VIEW TO ADDRESS DELINQUENCY IN REMITTANCE AND PENALTIES FOR LATE REMITTANCE AND/OR NON-COMPLIANCE BY EMPLOYERS, INCLUDING COOPERATIVES, WITH SECTIONS 18, 19 AND 22 OF THE SSS LAW TO ENSURE THE VIABILITY OF THE FUND
status: Pending with the Committee on LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT since 2017-03-14
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00824
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT AND OTHER APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, TO INQUIRE AND REVIEW, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, PROGRESS IN THE COLLECTION OF SSS CONTRIBUTIONS WITH A VIEW TO ADDRESS DELINQUENCY IN REMITTANCE AND PENALTIES FOR LATE REMITTANCE AND/OR NON-COMPLIANCE BY EMPLOYERS, INCLUDING COOPERATIVES, WITH SECTIONS 18, 19 AND 22 OF THE SSS LAW TO ENSURE THE VIABILITY OF THE FUND
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MENDOZA, RAYMUND DEMOCRITO C.
DATE FILED : 2017-02-23
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT ON 2017-03-14
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-03-06;
